alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 01 at 2:59PM EDT until October 02 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding expected. * WHERE...Upper Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
